title: Audiometry
instructionText: Tap 'Begin' when you are ready to start.

inputList.text: Measure Background Noise Before and After Exam (Default: No)

pages.title: WAHTS Calibration Check
pages.instructionText: Place WAHTS on the calibration check fixture. Press the button below when ready to begin.

pages.title: Background Noise Level
pages.instructionText: This test measures the background noise levels using the Svantek Dosimeter.  Press 3 or 10 seconds and then wait quietly for measurement to complete.

pages.title: Return Tablet
pages.questionSubText: Please return the tablet to the test administrator.

pages.title: Results
pages.questionSubText: Check the box below to save these results as a PDF.
